name: Barbados Cherry Jam
description: Barbados Cherry Jam - A value added product made from fresh Barbados Cherries grown at Chiguru Ecospace. Low in calories and containing one of the highest concentrations of Vitamin C for any plant-derived fruit in the world, Barbados cherries offer a bounty of health benefits, including a rich dose of antioxidants, an ability to combat obesity and aging, and a reduction in skin pigmentation
